mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weeklyreportdetail( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, week_flag, task_desc, content, task_status, cost_days, sort, project, task_type, weeklyreportid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{weekflag}, #{taskdesc}, #{content}, #{taskstatus}, #{costdays}, #{sort}, #{project}, #{tasktype}, #{weeklyreport.id} )
